abstract: Kim Yong-Jun (Chosŏn'gŭl: 김영준; Hancha: 金永峻; born July 19, 1983) is a North Korean international football player, who is currently playing for Pyongyang City.
comment: Kim Yong-Jun (Chosŏn'gŭl: 김영준; Hancha: 金永峻; born July 19, 1983) is a North Korean international football player, who is currently playing for Pyongyang City.
